::Kup/Lord Elder::
   
  Elder: I'll go and present our plan to Lord Perseus. Kup, if you don't mind, could you remain here and keep an eye on Hot Rod and Remus.
   
  Kup: Will do. I'll be fine here. Have Windlord go with you.
   
  Elder nodded and looked to Windlord to see if he was ready to go.
   
  ::Jhiaxus-Hevn::
   
  The Hevn puppet attaches the cloaking  device and signal masker to himself and Nightlight.
   
  Hevn: Hehehehehe. So easy. Beast mode!
   
  The puppet changes to its unusual beast mode and picks up Nightlight's limp, uncouncious body. He flies off towards Hydras' base. They are invisible to both optics and sensors.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Windlord/Nightlight:

Windlord nodded

*****************
Nightlight:

Nightlight opened her mounth surpriced when she looked the slung 
come, but before she could scream, she was hit and fell unconseus.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Kup/Lord Elder::
> 
> Elder: We'll need Rodimus... Err.. Hot Rod and Remus with us when 
we leave for the Ark. Any figuring out on how to re-energize Roddy's 
Matrix should be done there. Lord Perseus will have to know. Maybe 
send a team with a shuttle.
> 
> Kup: Agreed. It'll be a delicate job. We can't be foolin' around 
in the Ark too much.
> 
> ::Jhiaxus-Hevn::
> 
> Hevn: I was thinking we could go...
> 
> The Hevn puppet has noticed that they were unseen by others in 
the area and attempts to slug Nightlight with all his force across 
the jaw. He is attempting to knock her uncouncious.
> 
> Hevn's other hand is already pulling the cloaking and signal 
masking devices from subspace.
> 
>
